Invocation Name: turkish ezan
des:
The Turkish Ezan skill brings the beautiful and spiritual call to prayer (Ezan) to your Alexa-enabled devices. While the Ezan is recited in Arabic, this skill captures the unique pronunciation as it is heard from mosques across Turkey. Whether you're at home or at work, you can easily invoke this skill to listen to the familiar sound of the Adhan, bringing a piece of Turkey's spiritual atmosphere to your daily life.

The skill randomly selects from different recordings, providing a varied listening experience each time. Additionally, you can choose to play a specific recording by saying "play Ezan one" or "play Ezan two." Perfect for those who wish to connect with their faith through the authentic sounds of the Turkish mosque, whether you prefer the surprise of a random selection or the comfort of a familiar recitation.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
